text: Kamaghɨn ami, kɨ ia mɨkemegha gɨfa, ian arazir kuraba ikɨvɨra ikiam, eghtɨ ia aremegham. Ia kamaghɨn nɨghnɨzir gavgavim nan ikian kogh egh mɨkɨm suam, Kɨ Uabɨ Kɨ Kamaghɨn Iti, eghtɨ ian arazir kuraba ikɨvɨra ikɨtɨ ia arɨmɨghiram.”(8:24) Kisim Bek 3:14, God Moses ko uaning mɨgɨa, egha a uabɨ uan ziam dɨbora ghaze, “Kɨ Uabɨ Kɨ Kamaghɨn Iti.” Ezɨ Iesus uaghan kamaghɨra uabɨ dɨbori. Ezɨ gumazamiziba a mɨgeir akar kam deragha a gɨfozir puvatɨ. Nɨ Jon 8:28 ko 8:58 ko 13:19ɨn ganigh.
